channel.title: Rust Lang - Compiler Team
channel.description: Recent content on Rust Lang - Compiler Team

item.description: Frequently Asked Questions (FAQ) If you have a question, feel free to file an issue or ask in the working group’s Zulip stream. Is this working group optimizing the MIR of functions or the MIR-datastructures? Yes Why is the above answer so short? We’re doing both. MIR-datastructures are mostly restructured where necessary to make more optimizations possible.
Mir Optimizations (mir-opt) Meeting Notes This document will contain meeting notes from the mir-opt working group.
